ModMetaData.name: Cumpilation
ModMetaData.author: Vegapnk
ModMetaData.description: Fluid-based mechanics for RJW. Adds: - Bukkake (from external fluids) - Cumflation (from vaginal fluids) - Stuffing (from anal and oral fluids) - Cum as a consumable Item and Ingredient - Cum-Buckets and Auto-Cum-Buckets - Thoughts on Fluid-Consumption, progressing with more consumption - Interfaces for Drugs to change fluid-types and alter fluid-amounts - Oscillation Mechanics that increase or decrease cum amounts for a genital after usage - [Biotech] Slug, a Fluid Type to recycle/reuse wastepacks
